sentences.sContent: He calmed down in the end.
sentences.sCn: 他的情绪终于平定下来。

sentences.sContent: There really is no time like the present, and if you miss it…well…we all go away in the end.
sentences.sContent_eng: There really is no time like the present, and if you miss it…well…we all go away in the end.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，没有其他时间像是现在一样，如果你错过了现在……那么……我们最后都会死去。
